scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && mkdir build/scripts && mkdir build/styles && mkdir build/images && cp -r ProTeamManager/pages build && cp -r ProTeamManager/scripts build/scripts && cp -r ProTeamManager/images build/images && yarn sass ProTeamManager/styles/styles.sass build/styles/styles.css
scripts.clear: rm -rf build pages styles scripts images index.html login.html
